explains: v. 命令；指示；订购；点（酒菜等）；整理，安排（order 的现在分词）
wordGroup: ordering information 订货办法；订购须知

sentences.en: In July he issued a decree ordering all unofficial armed groups in the country to disband.
sentences.cn: 7月份，他颁布了一项法令，命令解散该国所有非官方武装团体。

sentences.en: Simple tasks like ordering food or taking a taxi were quite stressful.
sentences.cn: 点餐或打车这样的简单任务也会让人压力大。

sentences.en: Without even seeing the menu, I knew I'd be ordering every tomato on it.
sentences.cn: 甚至还没看菜单，我就知道我会点所有的番茄。
